name: Spring Boot ID Site Demo
description: SpringBootStormpathIDSite - This tag demonstrates a Spring Boot web app hooked up to ID Site for easy authentication and SSO

STORMPATH_API_KEY_ID.description: The API key ID from your ~/.stormpath/apiKey.properties file

STORMPATH_API_KEY_SECRET.description: The API key secret from tyou ~/.stormpath/apiKey.properties file

STORMPATH_APPLICATION_HREF.description: The URL for your Stormpath Application from the Stormpath Admin Dashboard

STORMPATH_WEB_APPLICATION_DOMAIN.description: The fully qualified domain name of your application. This will be something like: my-app-name.herokuapp.com and it should match the App Name you chose above.

STORMPATH_SSO_MESSAGE_PRIMARY.description: The primary message that will show on the restricted secret page.

STORMPATH_SSO_MESSAGE_SECONDARY.description: The secondary message that will show on the restricted secret page.

STORMPATH_SSO_CROSS_LINK.description: The fully qualified URL to the restricted page of the other site you setup for SSO
